text: mosega geuui baegseong-ege dol-awa bunnohago seulpeohamyeo illeoga lodoe naui bujaejung-e neohuiga haenghan geosdeul-i jeojuleul bad-eulini neohuineun junim-ui simpan-eul seodulleo jaechog hayeoss neunyo geulihayeo geuga seopan-eul deonji myeo geuui hyeongje meolileul jab-a geuege lo kkeul-eo dang-gini geuga illeo galo doe nae eomeoniui adeul-iyeo sillo baeg seongdeul-i naega yaghada saeng-gaghayeo na leul salhae halyeo hayeoss-eum-ila naleul kkujij-eo jeogdeul-eul gippeuge haji malmyeo naleul joejieunja gaunde han salam-eu lo saeng-gagchi malla hadeola
